name: Auto-Publish YouTube Videos to Facebook & Instagram with AI-Generated Captions
description:

## üè¢ Parfait pour

## ‚öôÔ∏è Ce qui est inclus

## üîß Exigences de configuration

## üìä Autorisations API Meta requises

## üé® Exemple de g√©n√©ration de l√©gendes par IA

## üéØ Options de personnalisation

## üè∑Ô∏è Tags & Cat√©gories

## üí° Exemples de cas d'utilisation

## üõ†Ô∏è Configuration & Support

parameters.content:
# üì± YouTube to Social Media Automation

**Purpose:** Auto-publish YouTube videos to Facebook & Instagram

**Schedule:** Checks for new videos every hour

**Required Setup:**
1. YouTube channel RSS feed
2. OpenAI API key (GPT-4o-mini)
3. Meta App with permissions
4. Long-lived access token

## Workflow Steps:
1. **Monitor** - RSS feed for new videos
2. **Generate** - AI creates social caption
3. **Publish** - Posts to FB & Instagram

üí° Update all `<Access_Token>` and `<Facebook_PageID>` placeholders

## üé• YouTube RSS Trigger

**Monitors your YouTube channel:**
- Checks every hour for new uploads
- Uses YouTube RSS feed format

**To find your channel ID:**
1. Go to your YouTube channel
2. View page source
3. Search for "channelId"

‚ö†Ô∏è Replace channel_id in RSS URL

## ü§ñ AI Caption Generation

**OpenAI GPT-4o-mini:**
- Generates engaging social media captions
- Includes emojis automatically
- Adds call-to-action

**Customize the prompt to:**
- Match your brand voice
- Include specific hashtags
- Target your audience

## üìò Facebook Publishing

**Direct post to Facebook Page**

‚ö†Ô∏è **Required updates:**
- Replace `<Facebook_PageID>`
- Replace `<Access_Token>`

**Note:** Uses error handling to continue workflow even if Facebook fails

## üì∏ Instagram Publishing Flow

**3-step process:**
1. Get Business Account ID
2. Create media container with thumbnail
3. Publish the post

**Automatic thumbnail:**
Pulls YouTube video thumbnail as Instagram image

‚ö†Ô∏è Requires Instagram Business Account linked to Facebook Page

‚ö†Ô∏è **Meta API Requirements**

**Required Permissions:**
- pages_manage_posts
- pages_read_engagement
- pages_show_list
- instagram_content_publish
- instagram_basic

**Token Type:** Long-lived access token
**API Version:** v22.0

nodes.name: AI Agent
nodes.notes: Formats post caption using video metadata. Customize prompt for your brand voice and hashtags

nodes.name: OpenAI Chat Model
nodes.notes: Uses GPT-4o-mini to generate the caption text

nodes.name: Post on Facebook
nodes.notes: Publishes the caption using Facebook Graph API. Replace <Facebook_PageID> and <Access_Token>

nodes.name: Publish Post On Instagram
nodes.notes: Publishes post to Instagram feed using the media container ID

nodes.name: Get IG Business Account ID
nodes.notes: Retrieves Instagram Business account ID linked to Facebook Page

nodes.name: Create Media Container
nodes.notes: Uploads YouTube thumbnail as Instagram image with AI-generated caption

nodes.name: Pull Youtube Video From Channel
nodes.notes: Monitors new uploads from your YouTube channel. Replace channel_id in RSS URL

user.name: Yaron Been

And check out my Youtube channel:
https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
